summary: A federal fund gives subsidies to low-income families to pay for child care while parents work or attend school. Here's some information we found about the fund: According to the Department of Health and Human Services, fewer families qualify for subsidies under state rules because most states set stricter income limits than the federal max Lower-income families with preschoolers got the most subsidies Some states...
title: Child Care: Subsidy Eligibility and Receipt, and Wait Lists
